rooms.name: Living Room / Dining Area
rooms.description: Centrally located open space with floor-to-ceiling windows that offer abundant natural light and cross ventilation. Incorporates Vastu principles by orienting the seating area towards the east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample storage and functional workspace. Placed adjacent to the living/dining area to allow ease of movement while maintaining privacy. South facing for optimal light in line with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Maid's Quarters
rooms.description: Small utility room located near the kitchen and service areas, designed according to local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space situated in a quiet corner with access to natural light. North facing window ensures minimal distractions and conducive work environment.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Essential amenities for guests, placed conveniently near the entrance.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming and secure entry point, complying with local safety norms.

openings.name: Service Door
openings.description: For utility and staff access, designed to maintain privacy.
